metadata.Title: CVE-2018-0487 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - high.
metadata.Description:
ARM mbed TLS before 1.3.22, before 2.1.10, and before 2.7.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (buffer overflow) via a crafted certificate chain that is mishandled during RSASSA-PSS signature verification within a TLS or DTLS session.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-0487` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmbedcrypto0 - 2.2.1-2ubuntu0.3
libmbedtls10 - 2.2.1-2ubuntu0.3
libmbedx509-0 - 2.2.1-2ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mbedtls package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.1-2ubuntu0.3').
